as addition inputs.

is also a standard benchmark for 3D object detection. The 
results are summarized in Table 3. Our base model with 
standard PointNet++ achieves 64.1 on mAP@0.25 and 47.2 
on mAP@0.5, which outperforms all previous state-of-the-
arts point-only methods.
